code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../App.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import DeleteButton from'./DeleteButton';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProductList=function ProductList(props){var productList=props.productList,setProductList=props.setProductList;var removeFromDom=function removeFromDom(productId){setProductList(productList.filter(function(product){return product._id!==productId;}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{children:"All Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Delete"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:productList.map(function(product,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/".concat(product._id),children:[' ',product.title,' ']})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:'/edit/'+product._id,children:"Edit"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteButton,{productId:product._id,successCallback:function successCallback(){return removeFromDom(product._id);}})})]},index);})})]})]});};export default ProductList;
